fee_codes.conditions: Not eligible for payment when radiographs made in a different institution or facility are used for comparison purposes with radiographs or ultrasounds made in the consultant’s institution or facility. Not eligible for payment for CT and MRI services.
Excludes time devoted to any other service or procedure for which an amount is payable in addition to the consultation.

fee_codes.description: Radiology second opinion of CT study, per study
fee_codes.conditions: Not eligible for payment when CT images made in a different institution or facility are used for comparison purposes. Limited to a maximum of one per study per patient per 30 day period.

fee_codes.description: Radiology second opinion of MRI study, per study
fee_codes.conditions: Not eligible for payment when MRI images made in a different institution or facility are used for comparison purposes. Limited to a maximum of one per study per patient per 30 day period.
Evaluates a patient on a non-emergent basis resulting in the cancellation or deferral of a planned diagnostic radiology procedure due to procedural difficulties.
Evaluates a patient on a non-emergent basis on the advisability of performing a diagnostic radiological procedure which eventually is not done.

fee_codes.description: Consultation - subject to the same conditions as A335
Special interventional radiological consultation - subject to the same conditions as A365
Radiology second opinion of CT study, per study - subject to the same conditions as A330
Radiology second opinion of MRI study, per study - subject to the same conditions as A332
